item.title: Report X-2024061412
item.description:
Report X-2024061412

Identified by scraper @ 2024-06-27T15:14:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-21
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: ABF FREIGHT SYSTEM, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Fernando Huizar, 134 Operations Supervisor, advised Safety of UN3093, CORROSIVE LIQUIDS, OXIDIZING,N.O.S. (CONTAINS CHROMIC ACID, PHOSPHORIC ACID, AND SULFURIC ACID)8(5.1) PGII spilled on top of a drum. Fernando stated Austin Bowman found the spill and alerted Fernando. Fernando advised the drums ha ve been sitting on the dock for a few day, so he does not know how the spill occurred. Fernando stated SC 134 was closing and asked for CURA to come on Monday morning. The spill is contained and no one will be there over the weekend.
